atk-s0103a2:8_4: That’s what happens when you roam out of your territory into the domain of others.
atk-s0103a2:9_0: So mendicants, don’t roam out of your own territory into the domain of others.
atk-s0103a2:9_1: And what is the five kinds of sensual stimulation?
atk-s0103a2:9_2: What are the teachings grouped by five?
atk-s0103a2:9_3: Sights known by the eye that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing.
atk-s0103a2:9_4: This is a mendicant who has improper attention.
